about_the_game:
Fantasy RPG BGM Pack - The Forest Land Edition.- is a collection of music suitable for high fantasy RPGs. It includes many BGM useful for creating short story RPGs, as well as tracks useful for depicting vast areas such as grassland and villages!

*******************************************
Audio: 18 tracks (including variations)
Main Theme: 1 track
Battle: 3 tracks (normal, strong enemy, boss)
Field: 2 tracks (grassland, forest)
Dungeon: 2 tracks (normal, versatile)
Town: 3 tracks (village, castle, demi-human village)
Scene: 4 tracks (heroic, unsettling, tragic, fun)
*The boss battle tracks come in three different versions!
*******************************************

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
